data.eml:eml: New species of lizard from the magellanicus clade of the Liolaemus lineomaculatus section (Squamata: Iguania: Liolaemidae) from southern Patagonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breitman, Maria Florencia, Pérez, Cristian Hernán Fulvio, Parra, Micaela, Morando, Mariana, Sites, Jack Walter, Avila, Luciano Javier (2011): New species of lizard from the magellanicus clade of the Liolaemus lineomaculatus section (Squamata: Iguania: Liolaemidae) from southern Patagonia. Zootaxa 3123: 32-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204780
